item.title: 消费者监督机构被特朗普政府架空，赔付陷入困境
item.description: 据一家权益组织称，特朗普政府将美国消费者金融保护局搁置起来的决定，使得一笔用于帮助据称受到学生贷款服务机构纳维利特公司（Navient）伤害的借款人的 1 亿美元资金陷入困境。【原文：The Trump administration's decision to put the U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau on ice has left a $100 million pot of money intended for borrowers allegedly harmed by the student loan servicer Navient sitting in limbo, according to an advocacy organization.】

item.title: 在太阳能电池板下放牧的绵羊帮助美国农民度过农作物价格低迷期
item.description: 雷恩斯一家四代人中，去年第一次没有种植一粒棉花种子。查德-雷恩斯（Chad Raines）把拖拉机停了下来，把得克萨斯州的大部分农田租给了邻居。【原文：For the first time in four generations, the Raines family didn't plant a single cotton seed last year. Chad Raines parked his tractor and rented out most of his Texas farmland to a neighbor.】

item.title: 在 3 月 14 日最后期限到来之前，美国国会尚未达成避免停摆的协议
item.description: 距离 3 月 14 日的最后期限还有不到两周的时间，美国国会的共和党和民主党似乎还远未达成避免政府关门的协议，而政府关门将使华盛顿陷入更深的动荡。【原文：With less than two weeks to go before a March 14 deadline, Republicans and Democrats in the U.S. Congress appear to be nowhere close to a deal to avert a government shutdown that would throw Washington into deeper turmoil.】

item.title: 环球时报》称中国准备对美国关税威胁采取反制措施
item.description: 据中国国家控制的《环球时报》报道，中国正准备对将于周二生效的美国新进口关税采取反制措施，这增加了世界前两大经济体之间爆发全面贸易战的可能性。【原文：China is preparing countermeasures against fresh U.S. import tariffs set to take effect on Tuesday, China's state-controlled Global Times reported, raising the prospect of an all-out trade war between the world's top two economies.】

item.title: 美国商务部长希望将政府支出从 GDP 中剔除
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周日表示，他将从国内生产总值（GDP）报告中剔除政府支出，但没有说明这一变化可能在多长时间内发生，同时他也否认了可能出现经济衰退的担忧。【原文：U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said on Sunday he would strip out government spending from the gross domestic product (GDP) report, but gave no indication how soon this change might happen, while dismissing fears of a possible recession.】

item.title: 美国关税紧张局势加剧，铁矿石创逾六周新低
item.description: 由于美国与第一大消费国中国之间的贸易紧张局势加剧，铁矿石期货周一连续第六个交易日下跌，尽管乐观的中国制造业数据缓解了跌势。【原文：Iron ore futures fell for a sixth straight session on Monday amid rising trade tensions between the U.S. and top consumer China, although upbeat Chinese manufacturing data cushioned the fall.】

item.title: 中国制造业数据向好，乐观情绪有所升温，石油价格回升
item.description: 油价周一上涨了 1%，原因是全球最大的原油进口国中国的制造业数据向好，使人们对燃料需求重新感到乐观，尽管美国可能加征关税给全球经济增长带来的不确定性依然存在。【原文：Oil prices rose 1% on Monday as upbeat manufacturing data from China, the world's biggest crude importer, led to renewed optimism for fuel demand, although uncertainty about global economic growth from potential U.S. tariffs loomed.】

item.title: 美国国际开发署（USAID）官员警告说，特朗普的外援封锁会造成不必要的死亡，然后又说他被放假了
item.description: 美国国际开发署（U.S. Agency for International Development）的一名高级官员在周日的一封电子邮件中警告说，特朗普政府解散该机构将导致不必要的死亡--但不到30分钟后，他就给自己的员工发邮件说，他已经被安排休假。【原文：A senior official with the U.S. Agency for International Development in an email on Sunday warned that the Trump administration's dismantling of the agency will result in unnecessary deaths -- only to email his staff less than 30 minutes later to say that he had been placed on leave.】

item.title: 日经新闻》称，七国集团正在敲定伊萨卡总统下台计划
item.description: 处于收购战中心的日本零售巨头 Seven & i 控股公司正在敲定一项计划，让公司总裁下台，由公司首位外国总裁接任。【原文：Seven & i Holdings , the Japanese retail giant at the centre of a takeover battle, is finalising a plan for its president to step down and be replaced by the company's first foreign chief.】

item.title: 美国财政部表示不会执行反洗钱法
item.description: 美国财政部周日表示，将不会执行一项要求数百万企业实体披露其真实受益所有人身份的反洗钱法。【原文：The U.S. Treasury Department said on Sunday it would not enforce an anti-money laundering law that obliges millions of business entities to disclose the identities of their real beneficial owners.】

item.title: 英国就儿童个人数据行为对 TikTok 和 Reddit 展开调查
item.description: 英国隐私监管机构信息专员办公室周一对 TikTok、Reddit 和在线图片分享网站 Imgur 如何保护儿童隐私展开了调查。【原文：Britain's privacy watchdog, the Information Commissioner's Office, on Monday launched an investigation into how TikTok, Reddit and online image sharing website Imgur safeguard children's privacy.】

item.title: 欧洲推动乌克兰和平，欧元反弹；比特币大涨
item.description: 周一，欧元兑美元从两周半的低点反弹，英镑也因欧洲带头重新推动乌克兰和平而走高。【原文：The euro rebounded from a 2-1/2-week low against the U.S. dollar on Monday and sterling also advanced with Europe taking the lead in a renewed push for peace in Ukraine.】

item.title: 新世界发展誓言增加现金流、削减债务后股价大涨
item.description: 周一早盘，新世界发展股价大涨，这家香港大型开发商在公布中期净亏损66.3亿港元（8.5263亿美元）后表示，将增加现金流并削减债务。【原文：Shares of New World Development rallied in early trading on Monday after the major Hong Kong developer said it would increase cash flow and cut debt as it reported an interim net loss of HK$6.63 billion ($852.63 million).】

item.title: 中国茶饮料美素佳儿在香港上市首日股价上涨近 30
item.description: 中国最大的泡沫红茶和饮料连锁店美雪集团在首次公开募股（IPO）中筹集了 4.44 亿美元，该公司周一在香港证券交易所上市首日股价大涨近 30%。【原文：Shares of China's largest bubble tea and drinks chain Mixue Group jumped nearly 30% on their first day of trading on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange on Monday after the firm raised $444 million in an initial public offering (IPO).】

item.title: 特朗普列出储备代币后，比特币上涨五分之一
item.description: 比特币周一的交易价格较上周低点上涨了五分之一，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示将纳入美国新战略储备的其他几种加密货币也大幅反弹。【原文：Bitcoin was trading up a fifth from last week's lows on Monday and several other cryptocurrencies that U.S. President Donald Trump said would be included in a new U.S. strategic reserve also rallied sharply.】

item.title: 中国最受欢迎的火水需求退潮加剧债务担忧
item.description: 中国这一地区生产的优质白酒为其经济引擎提供了动力。长期以来，这种酒一直是婚礼、商务晚宴和国事活动的必备品，但其销量却在下降，这说明中国政府现在必须正视更广泛的弊病。【原文：A premium liquor made in this region of China fuels its economic engine. Long a fixture at weddings, business dinners and state functions, its sales are falling, illustrating a wider malaise that Beijing now must confront.】

item.title: 基兰-卡尔金凭借《真正的痛楚》荣获奥斯卡最佳男配角奖
item.description: 基兰-卡尔金因在《真正的痛楚》中饰演一个满嘴跑火车的美国游客而在周日赢得了奥斯卡最佳男配角奖。【原文：Kieran Culkin won the best supporting actor Oscar on Sunday for playing a motor-mouthed American tourist in "A Real Pain."】

item.title: 亚洲股市紧张等待关税消息，比特币大涨
item.description: 周一，亚洲股市在即将到来的关税威胁的背景下踌躇不前，而比特币却因将被纳入美国新的加密货币战略储备的消息而大涨。【原文：Asian share markets dithered on Monday as the threat of imminent tariffs lurked in the background, while bitcoin surged on news it would be included in a new U.S. strategic reserve of cryptocurrencies.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，普拉达正在接近以 16 亿美元收购范思哲的交易
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周日报道，意大利奢侈品集团普拉达（Prada）在同意以近 15 亿欧元（16 亿美元）的价格从高端时尚集团卡普里控股（Capri Holdings）手中收购范思哲（Versace）的交易后，正逐步接近该交易。【原文：Italian luxury group Prada is moving closer to a deal to buy Versace from upmarket fashion group Capri Holdings after agreeing to a price of nearly 1.5 billion euros ($1.6 billion), Bloomberg News reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：壳牌考虑出售欧洲和美国化工资产
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周日援引知情人士的话报道，壳牌正在考虑出售其在欧洲和美国的化工资产。【原文：Shell is considering a potential sale of its chemicals assets in Europe and the United States, the Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday, citing sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 比特币上涨 6.06%，报 89 359 美元
item.description: 比特币是全球市值最大的加密货币，格林尼治标准时间周日16时20分，比特币上涨约6.06%，报89359美元。【原文：Bitcoin, the world's largest cryptocurrency by market value, was up by around 6.06% at $89,359 at 1620 GMT on Sunday.】

item.title: 中国荣耀宣布投资 100 亿美元开发人工智能设备
item.description: 中国智能手机制造商荣耀（Honor）首席执行官李开复（James Li）周日表示，随着前华为部门准备上市，荣耀将在未来五年斥资 100 亿美元为其设备开发人工智能。【原文：Chinese smartphone maker Honor will spend $10 billion over the next five years on developing AI for its devices as the former Huawei unit prepares for a public listing, its CEO James Li said on Sunday.】

item.title: 特朗普将加密货币列入战略储备；价格飙升
item.description: 分析师表示，加密货币市场需要一个走高的理由，比如美联储计划降息的迹象，或者特朗普政府明确支持加密货币的监管框架。【原文：Analysts say the crypto market needs a reason to move higher, such as indications that the Federal Reserve plans to cut interest rates or a clear pro-crypto regulatory framework from the Trump administration.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Allegro吸引了安森美半导体的收购兴趣
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周日援引熟知内情的人士的话报道，传感器集成电路供应商 Allegro Microsystems 正吸引更大的竞争对手安森美半导体（ON Semiconductor）的收购兴趣。【原文：Sensor integrated circuits provider Allegro Microsystems is drawing takeover interest from larger competitor ON Semiconductor , Bloomberg News reported on Sunday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国商务部长表示，特朗普将于下周二确定墨西哥和加拿大关税的确切水平
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周日表示，对加拿大和墨西哥的关税将于周二生效，但唐纳德-特朗普总统将决定是否坚持25%的关税水平。【原文：U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said on Sunday that tariffs on Canada and Mexico will go into effect on Tuesday, but that President Donald Trump will determine whether to stick with the planned 25% level.】

item.title: 共和党人约翰逊希望美国采取 "干净 "的拨款措施，等待削减开支
item.description: 美国众议院议长迈克-约翰逊（Mike Johnson）周日表示，他希望通过一项 "干净利落 "的临时拨款措施，使联邦机构在目前的开支水平上运作到九月份，并将削减开支的建议留待下一财年立法时讨论。【原文：U.S. House Speaker Mike Johnson said on Sunday that he wants to pass a "clean" stopgap funding measure to keep federal agencies operating at current spending levels through September and leave proposed cuts for legislation for the next fiscal year.】

item.title: 特朗普盟友向泽伦斯基施压，要求其改变路线或辞职
item.description: 上周的白宫会议引发了对战争未来的质疑。【原文：Last week's contentious White House meeting raised questions about the future of the war.】

item.title: 独家报道部长称加拿大将把矿产勘探税收抵免再延长两年
item.description: 矿产勘探税收抵免是一种资本市场工具，为投资者投资小型矿业公司的流通股提供 15%的税收抵免，该工具将于 3 月 31 日到期。【原文：The mineral exploration tax credit, a capital market tool that offers investors a 15% tax credit to invest in flow-through shares of smaller mining companies, was set to expire on March 31.】

item.title: CoreLogic 数据显示，降息提振了市场情绪，澳大利亚房地产市场结束下滑趋势
item.description: 随着四年多来首次降息提振了购房者的情绪，澳大利亚房地产市场在 2 月份摆脱了低迷状态，但仍然居高不下的借贷成本和高涨的房价给市场前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：Australia's property market emerged from a shallow downturn in February as the first rate cut in over four years lifted buyer sentiment, although the still-high borrowing costs and elevated prices are clouding the outlook.】

item.title: 美国参议院让特朗普减税计划永久化引发 "债务螺旋 "担忧
item.description: 美国参议院共和党人提出了一项有争议的计划，即通过忽略赤字成本使唐纳德-特朗普总统 2017 年的减税政策永久化，该计划引发了党内财政鹰派人士和独立分析人士的警告，称可能会出现破坏经济增长的 "债务螺旋"。【原文：A controversial plan by U.S. Senate Republicans to make President Donald Trump's 2017 tax cuts permanent by ignoring the cost to the deficit is raising warnings from party fiscal hawks and independent analysts of a potential "debt spiral" that could undermine economic growth.】
